mapper.sql: id as id , token as token , name as name , icon as icon , countyId as countyId , schoolName as schoolName , birthdayDate as birthdayDate , sex as sex , subjectType as subjectType , mail as mail , qq as qq
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_user_info ( id, token, name, icon, countyId, schoolName, birthdayDate, sex, subjectType, mail, qq ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{token}, #{name}, #{icon}, #{countyId}, #{schoolName}, #{birthdayDate}, #{sex}, #{subjectType}, #{mail}, #{qq} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
